entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Timmins
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:33 a.m. EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 8.8Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Timmins Victor Power Airport 1:00 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 8.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 10 km
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: 8.2°C
Wind: ESE 16 km/h gust 27 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a
